item.description:
This time we will be viewing and discussing a DVD called "Postures of Love and Steps Toward Joy", by Kathara Team Member Rosaleen Tobin.

We will also pass around the accompanying (73 page) handbook which comes with it.

This can be ordered from the Azurite Press (http://www.azuritepress.com). 

 

To give you an idea of the content, on page 13 it states:

 

"Absolute Love creates the experience of absolute joy and ecstatic fulfilment-- and, in human terms, generates the attributes of all those feelings and sensations deemed as "good." 

 

All conditions of disease, conflict, pain, anguish and suffering are the direct result and manifestation of vibrational dissonance of individual consciousness with the God Mind.

 

The only absolute cure for any malady is absolute love.

 

... Creating the experience of At-One-Ment is the process of progressive expansion beyond the boundaries of the personality and ego identity into the greater aspects of gestalt identity as contained within the family tree of consciousness-- a progressive realization of the Self as a plural rather than singular construct.

 

The personal identity is not lost, overtaken or compromised within the expansion of Self-- it is instead its Self, expanded to become the gestalt identity.. just as the identity of the child expands to become the adult."

 

We will be joined by members of another group which has already been studying Keylontic Science.

 

                   ******

Would you like to know exactly what your Silver Seed is?

How about where it is located?

And most important, how to awaken it so you can reclaim your original organic capabilities for perpetual joy, wellness, and natural organic Krystic ascension?

Cloistered historical records indicate this part of our anatomy has not been working properly since the days of Atlantis, when misuse of energy by various groups created serious cataclysmic events.

 

Why has this information been returned to earth's planetary populations at this time?

 

Because the window of opportunity to restore our original organic capabililties will forever close on December 21, 2012 due to what is happening on a cosmic level.

 

To understand irreversable energy changes occuring on that date, view all 3 videos on the following link.  Each takes 2 hours to view, so get comfy and take notes. If you have any questions,  bring them with you. 

 http://www.KrystalSpiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm

 

Since it takes time to systematically employ a series of KS techniques to progressively shield against devistating 12/21/12 energies...


THE  TIME IS NOW...

to reawaken your Silver Seed and restore your natural organic bio-spiritual energy flows.  

This group is where you will learn how... and MUCH MORE!

                         ******

We will be joined by members from another group, who have already been studying Keylontic Science.

This Meetup runs from 6 PM - 9 PM. 

Please bring your own refreshments, and check this site for last minute cancellations before leaving. Especially during the winter months, there can be too much snow accumulation to allow for ample parking. 

 

IMPORTANT: 

If you cannot physically attend, but would like to be added to the distribution list to receive a summary of questions answered (via link references) during the Meetup, please contact organizer by clicking here: 

 http://www.ulcsclinic.com/contact.html

This is necessary because group organizer can't access the e-mail address associated with this Meetup site.  That means using Meetup's "contact us" button under the Group Organizer name in left margin won't bring any response.

                         ******

Additional Details follow:

If time allows, the translators of this  information may later publish it in the form of a book. The (approx) title will be "Earth After 2012, Orb Whisperers, and The Silver Seed Awakening" by Ashayana Deane.

But because TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE, we are studying this info as soon as each segment is released in workshop form.

A series of "Sliders" workshops can be viewed by scrolling down on this link:

http://www.azuritepress.com/products_us/list%20pages/sliders_series.php

While viewing those titles, check out the contents of Sliders 10, 11, and 12 which will be viewed and discussed in detail during our group Meetups.

That's because this is where the detailed info on the silver seed awakening is given, including the necessary techniques. However, it is also recommended that members start studying the earlier Sliders workshops in preparation.

It is also recommended that members study Kathara, the ancient healing modality that uses Keylontic Science (KS), since this is the foundations course for all future studies of this FASCINATING information... which is all TRUE!  (ie, the KS techniques really work).

For information on that, click here:

http://www.katharateam.com/Nweb/Kathara_nw.htm


THE IMPLICATIONS OF THIS INFORMATION ARE IMMENSE!

These technicals describe exactly WHAT our Silver Seed is, WHERE it is located, why it has not been functioning properly since the days of Atlantis... and how correct the mutation to restore our ancient organic capabilities... before the window of opportunity to do so closes Dec 21, 2012.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Meetup sign at end of first driveway and enter through front door which has another Meetup sign. No need to knock, just have a seat in downstairs classroom.

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: Postures of Love and Steps Toward Joy
